message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $19,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  How about we meet halfway and settle on $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is the most I can afford. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
